title: Symphonic String Music
description: Add this collection of original Cinematic Symphonic String music to your Unreal game dev toolbox.  This collection features 22 loops as well as a bonus victory and defeat one-shot music cues.
longDescription:
Introducing an exceptional symphonic string orchestra music asset pack for Unreal Engine developers!




Dive into a world of sound with 22 meticulously crafted looping tracks, each designed to elevate your game's atmosphere. Whether you need calm pastoral landscapes, eerie spooky strings, melodic and sorrowful tunes, or action-packed, suspenseful, and triumphant scores, this pack has it all. Plus, as a special bonus, you'll get a victorious one-hit track and a sullen defeat one-hit track to punctuate those critical game moments. The more energetic suspense and triumph tracks include versions with and without cinematic drums to use to highlight changes in gameplay. Elevate your gameâ€™s audio experience with this versatile and dynamic orchestral collection!




Demo of every single music loop and one-shot track below!


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d2GDa3ollxk
technicalDetails:

  • CUE_WAV_SpookyStrings_Cue.uasset
  • CUE_WAV_SuspenseMoreStrings Drums_Cue.uasset

Number of Audio Wavs: 24

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz/16 bit

Does music loop: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: N/A
